Name: Average time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average time between 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' in cases where it leads to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and activity Payment Handled for cases where activity Payment Handled occurs

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time it takes from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to the start of 'Request Payment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time it takes 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to be followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Minimum time for 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to be followed by any approval activity
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average waiting time to the 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' from the start of the case
Metric: The average of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Payment Handled' in successful cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and activity Payment Handled for cases where activity Payment Handled occurs

Name: Average time from 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' to the next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' in cases ending with 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE and activity Payment Handled for cases where activity Payment Handled occurs

Name: Total time for 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' in cases with 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION occurs
